name: Light's Out (KeithBoysGames)
description:
Version 1.1

Welcome to Light's Out.  A parkour/puzzle game set in complete darkness.

Stand in a light beam to reveal the layout of the level, but when you step out of it, the level is filled with darkness. Can you remember the layout and parkour your way through?

Patch notes: Version 1.1

  • Polished title screen.
  • Added pack select screen.
  • Added Jungle and Endurance packs.
  • Added post processing effects.
  • Added pause menu.
  • Level select screen now shows when a level has been completed.
  • Added game icon.
